Name: Hentai Chicks 2
About the game: Hentai Chicks 2 is a casual puzzle game in which all you have to do is fill in hexa pieces into a shape by adding a full drawing. The game lets you take a hint if you get stuck and view images with one hand. When you have completed a puzzle, you can return at any time to view the available images or re-solve the puzzles. The game has no time to solve puzzles or other constraints, the goal is to let you relax. FEATURES ▶ 15 widescreen pictures ▶ 3 Live2D images ▶ Arrange the blocks so that they fit in the mold ▶ Fragments can be aligned and dragged back into place ▶ No time limit ▶ Easy to play ▶ Use a hint when you don't know where to place the block piece correctly ▶ Hexa blocks cannot be rotated ▶ Nice rhythmic music ▶ Your progress is saved ▶ Gallery can be viewed with one hand (͡ ° ͜ʖ ͡ °) ▶ Hentai Chicks 2 game helps you relieve stress!
